formalText: He feels okay today.
He thinks he's definitely kind of mildly depressed or something.
He feels tired.
He was already feeling a little bit off before all of this shit happened.
It was crazy and was definitely traumatizing.
There's no question.
Just like the sounds were so loud.
It was clearly there was no confusing.
It was surreal.
It sounded like there was a war going on.
The horrifying part is the first thing he thought because it sounded like it was so much noise.
He was horrified that they came to Josiah and there was some kind of group.
And that there was suddenly 30 insane people waiting fully armed for him.
He doesn't know what that was. It was horrifying.
He was wide awake.
They were talking and he had the window kind of open, and he saw all these cops flying down the street, and he thought that's weird.
He was like, they're going right now.

They're getting in the car and they're going, but then for whatever reason he thought to call 911 when he told them his address and stuff and they were like just turn off all the lights and don't go near the windows.
It's just very depressing.
He just feels tired.
He definitely feels kind of depressed.
He doesn't feel very motivated.
He's been feeling a little bit sick to his stomach.
It's weird. That only accentuated how he was already feeling, so now everything feels really weird and discombobulated.
It's just strange going back to their routines.
He wonders if maybe he had some kind of low-grade depression going on even before all this happened?
He wasn't feeling awful, but he's just so tired.
It's like there's a part of him that just wants to be alone.
He just feels drained.
His appetite is back, but he just feels off.
He did have one of those moments Friday when they came and they said how is he doing when he locked the door.
That was the one time he just completely broke down.
It's overwhelming.
It definitely feels like a rollercoaster.
He was feeling good and now he feels like shit.
He just has to find a way to regain some energy right now.
He just feels like he has no energy.
He just feels kind of sick.
He's trying not to be so hard on himself.
He was thinking on the one hand what sucks now is he's full of anxiety.
Like what's the next bad thing that's going to happen.
